aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Executive and Board Member Signatures
Brian T. Olsavsky is Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Amazon.
Brian T. Olsavsky is the Principal Financial Officer of Amazon.
Shelley L. Reynolds signed as Vice President, Worldwide Controller of Amazon.
Shelley L. Reynolds is the Principal Accounting Officer of Amazon.
Jeffrey P. Bezos signed as Executive Chair of Amazon.
Jeffrey P. Bezos is the Executive Chair of Amazon.
Keith B. Alexander signed as Director of Amazon.
Keith B. Alexander is a Director of Amazon.
Edith W. Cooper signed as Director of Amazon.
Edith W. Cooper is a Director of Amazon.
Jamie S. Gorelick signed as Director of Amazon.
Jamie S. Gorelick is a Director of Amazon.
Daniel P. Huttenlocher signed as Director of Amazon.
Daniel P. Huttenlocher is a Director of Amazon.
Andrew Y. Ng signed as a representative of Amazon.
